sentence: "This morning, after Brian Kemp signed a slew of anti-education bills into law, Georgia parents and educators let him know that they CONDEMN this legislation," Georgia Democrats tweeted Thursday afternoon with pictures of a rally with signs reading "No banning books."
author: Sharon Bernstein
title: Georgia becomes latest U.S. state to ban 'divisive' concepts in teaching about race
